name: Hana Block
author: RewindCreation

sections.description:
Hana Block is a very simple and yet powerful plugin.

  • Custom post type hana_block is created to manage content block using the WYSIWYG editor
  • There are 2 types of content blocks: Layout and Content.
  • The content block can be included in post, page and text widget using short code [content-block]
  • The content block can be included in any theme supported action hooks.

For documentation, please visit RewindCreation.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the hana-block.zip.
  2. Upload the hana-block folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. Activate Hana Block in Plugin section
sections.faq:
Why was this plugin created?

One of the WordPress’ weakness is lack of content blocks. The plugin is created to allow users to maintain and use the repeatable contents.

Where can I get supports?

http://rewindcreation.com/support/

Where can I get documentation?

http://rewindcreation.com/hana-block/

short_description: A simple and powerful plugin that allows you to create content block and display anywhere.
